name: momentary-objective-manager

examples.text: Hi, edit my events for me
Hi, update my projects for me
Hi, I'd like to change my projects
Hi, I'd like to edit my events
let's see what's got to change

intents.description: Change some of the entities that currently exist, possibly even deleting them.

examples.text: Hi, show my events for me
Hi, show my projects for me
Hi, I'd like to see my projects
Hi, I'd like to see my events
let's see what's going on today

intents.description: Display what events and projects currently exist.

examples.text: Hi, make an event for me
Hi, make a project for me
Hi, I'd like to create an event
please add an event to my calendar
What can I do with you
What can you do for me

intents.description: A list of capabilities that the bot can return.

examples.text: Hi, purge my events for me
Hi, get rid of my projects for me
Hi, I'd like to remove my projects
Hi, I'd like to delete events on Friday
let's see what's got to go away

intents.description: Truly delete entities, like completely gone.
Snarky replies and stuff to make this bot interesting.
In case we're in the middle of a flow and need to get out of it, at least then nwe can.

examples.text: what do you think of your mom
What do you think of Siri?

description: MOM is a turnkey project management solution for individuals and PM's looking to optimize their time without manual labor.

output.text: Alarm, Would you like to repeat this daily, weekly, or just once?

values.0: Awesome, we just made an event starting on $event_start_date at $event_start_time ending on $event_end_date at $event_end_time. It'll last for $event_duration hours and repeat $event_repeat at the following location: $event_location. It's of $event_priority importance so we'll remind you!

output.text: Event, How important is this? 0-3, or not important to critical?
Event, How often should this repeat? You can say daily, weekly, occurrences, once?
Alarm, How important is this? 0-3, or not important to critical?
Alarm, What type of alarm? Would you like to hear a simple tone, your events, tasks, or both?
Event, How often should this repeat? You can say daily, weekly, occurrences, once?
Alarm, How long do you want to snooze for?

values: We didn't pick up anything you wanted to do with projects. You could say for example, "create a project" or "update a project I've got going on already".
Can't do anything on just 'project'. Please add some sort of intent you'd like to do with a project. Basically any CRUD indication would be  helpful.

values.0: Event created called $event_title with the description of $event_description. It starts $event_start_date @ $event_start_time and ends on $event_end_date @ $event_end_time for $event_duration hours at $event_location. Saved under $event_calendar_type calendar as a $event_priority priority event that repeats $event_repeat.

values: We didn't pick up anything you wanted to do with projects. You could say for example, "create a project" or "update a project I've got going on already".
Can't do anything on just 'project'. Please add some sort of intent you'd like to do with a project. Basically any CRUD indication would be  helpful.
We didn't pick up anything you wanted to do with projects. You could say for example, "create a project" or "update a project I've got going on already".
Can't do anything on just 'project'. Please add some sort of intent you'd like to do with a project. Basically any CRUD indication would be  helpful.

output.text: Event, How important is this? 0-3, or not important to critical?

values.0: Alarm created for $alarm_date at $alarm_time called 'INSERT RANDOM'. We'll let you snooze for $alarm_snooze minutes and it will repeat $alarm_repeat. It's gonna be a $alarm_type kind of alarm and it's $alarm_priority.

values: MOM is a turnkey project management solution for individuals and PM's looking to optimize their time without manual labor.
You can ask me things like "make me a project", or "can you set an alarm for me?", and even "please cancel all of my appointments on Friday?"
Hello. How can I help you?
Yo, use me to help organize your life!
You can use me to do all kinds of amazing things. Just ask or start commanding away!
